value:
I'm flooded with memories of those
warm and halcyon days. Oh, Sigurd,
Deirdre...

My brother and my husband are so
careless, and you make three! Take
some pride in your appearance.

Everyone needs to take a break now
and again. Wait just a moment and I'll
prepare some tea for you.

Altena... Leif... I will protect both of
you. I swear it.

It looks as if the seam on your
shoulder has come undone.$k$pCome here and let me fix it. I was
already mending these clothes, so
it's no trouble.

I am Ethlyn. I have brought a friendly
hello from $Nf.

I am a descendant of the crusader
Baldr. For the sake of the children, I
must prevail!

No matter the trials I face, I must
persevere! I just know it will all work
out in the end.

If this is all I am capable of...I must
be a hindrance.

I feel renewed! I wonder if Quan will
notice that something's different...

I am Ethlyn, wife of Quan of the
House of Leonster. Ask me what
you will—but keep it brief, please.

Greetings, $Nu.$k$pHow is your family? Tell me...is there
anyone you've pledged yourself to, a
lifelong love?$k$pBoth my husband, Quan, and my
brother are irreplaceable to me. I am
truly blessed to have them.$k$pMore than that, though...my daughter,
Altena, and my son, Leif...$k$pWhenever I picture their smiling
faces...I can endure anything.$k$pFor those who matter most to me,
there is nothing I cannot overcome.
Risking my life does not scare me.$k$pI hope that you can find the same
strength within you. Let us fight
together, unfailingly!
ええいっ！
それっ！
きゃああっ！
そんな…
I'll protect you!
Forgive me!
Until the very end!
All will be well. You'll see!
Quan, I'm so sorry...
giggle
I'm right here with you.
Never give up!
Just like my brother, am I? Well, when my mind is set on something, I won't back down. That's true.
Oh, it's just you.
My brother has a tendency to be reckless. I have to keep an eye on him, or I worry.
I pray that Deirdre and my brother can lead a happy life together...
Thank you for keeping me in your thoughts. You're very kind.
Of course.
Oh, sorry!
Together, we can win.
